data.message: As the mother of a visually impaired daughter this makes me very very happy.  Can't wait until she gets home from school to tell her

replies.message: We loved hearing this, Tracy. We're so excited for you and your daughter. Thanks for being a valuable part of our community! -Rey
Facebook Thanks, what a beautiful idea!
Inclusion is always good, FB striving for the best. Great job to all who came up with this idea.
God bless you and your daughter.
now i can make one for my daughter whom is visually impaired to thank you facebook

Facebook In 12 years you've changed the way people/family/associates/relitives/Ect. and in general the way the world communicates with each other; an absolute magnicent contribution to this earths harmony.... Please keep up the good work! we look forward to each and every convenience you forward our way!!!

Facebook Hey Facebook ,
I have a question...

Why do I no longer have a choice to opt out of Facebook using my phone contacts information, even with my sync contacts settings turned off, why is there no option out anymore and is now mandatory?

What do you need this information for?

I don't want my profile popping up on peoples Facebook simply because they have my phone number in their phones, how do I stop that?
